homely.translation[0].definitions[0].def: simple in a way that makes you feel comfortable
homely.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: a modern hotel with a homely atmosphere
homely.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a homely person is warm and friendly and enjoys home life
homely.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: Mrs Keane is a comfortable, homely person.
